official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to establish an Office of Inspector General within the United States Postal Service.

summary.text: Establishes the Office of Inspector General in the Postal Service. Sets forth the duties and responsibilities of such office, including to direct policy and coordinate audits and investigations relating to Postal Service operations. Requires semiannual reports to the Congress on the Office's operations.
